amendment.description: Amendment sought to lower the mandatory minimum voting age to age 16 in federal elections.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to lower the mandatory minimum voting age to age 16 in federal elections.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 305, 2 Present (Roll no. 111).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Ms. Pressley.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pressley amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 305, 2 Present (Roll no. 111).
